privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy was prepared in compliance with Federal Law No. 13.709/2018 (General Data Protection Law - LGPD), the Internet Bill of Rights (Law No. 12.965/2014), and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for European users.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.text: We collect essential information for the provision of services, such as name, email, and navigation data, respecting the principles of necessity and transparency.

usage.title: Data Usage and Processing
usage.text: Your data is used for authentication, user experience improvement, and course communication. We ensure technical and administrative security measures to protect your personal data (Cybercrime Law No. 12.737/2012).

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: According to the LGPD, you have the right to confirmation, access, correction, anonymization, blocking, or elimination of unnecessary data. To exercise your rights, contact us through our channels (CCPA applicable for California residents).

contact.title: 4. Communication Channel (Data Protection Officer)
contact.text: To exercise any of your rights mentioned above, or to ask questions about how we process your data, you can contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) via email: devproacademy@outlook.com.

refund.title: 3. Cancellation and Refund Policy

refund.deadline: Regret Period: You have a period of 7 (seven) calendar days, starting from the date of purchase or course access release, to request cancellation and a full refund of the amount paid.
